name: Tasty
description: API to query data about recipe, plan, ingredients, etc... as on official site

api_methods.name: tips/list
api_methods.description: This endpoint is used to load tips (reviews)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The value of recipe id returned in .../recipes/list .../feeds/list .../recipes/list-similarities endpoints

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of items returned per response

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The offset of items to be ignored in response for paging

utterances.utterance: Can you show me the first 10 reviews for the chocolate chip cookie recipe with ID 1234?
I want to read some tips starting from the 5th review for the lasagna recipe, which has the ID 5678.
Please fetch 15 user reviews for the avocado toast recipe with the ID 4321.
Could you get me the next 20 tips after the first 20 for the vegan chili recipe, ID 8765?
I’d like to see all the reviews available for the banana bread recipe with ID 3456, starting from the beginning.
Retrieve 5 tips from the middle of the reviews for the chicken curry recipe, which is ID 7890.
Show me the first 30 reviews for the gluten-free pancakes recipe, ID 2468.
Find the user feedback starting at the 10th review for the shrimp scampi recipe with ID 1357.
Get 12 tips for the classic Caesar salad recipe, which has the recipe ID 9753.
Please load the reviews from number 25 to 40 for the beef stew recipe, ID 8642.
